frame.name: Dough_rising
frame.definition:
<def-root>The LUs of this frame describe a lump of <fen>Dough</fen> expanding as gas develops inside it. This is part of a process where, in order to produce a lighter, more easily chewed bread, <fen>Dough</fen> is leavened with yeast, baking soda or in another fashion to add gas to it before baking.
<ex>I've got no frozen boxed meals, and no other real options to make something to keep me going while <fex name="dou">my pizza dough</fex> <t>rises</t>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Dough
FE.definition:
<def-root>The paste made out of any cereals (grains) or leguminous crops by grinding, with some water added, which expands in volume as a result of leavening before baking.
<ex>While <fex name="dou">the dough</fex> was <t>rising</t>, they heated the oven.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Duration_of_activity
FE.definition:
<def-root>The length of the interval during which the <fen>Dough</fen> rises.
<ex>The dough <t>rose</t> <fex name="dur">for about 2 hours</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Time</fen> when the expansion of the <fen>Dough</fen> takes place.
<ex> The dough <t>rose</t> beautifully <fex name="tim">before it went into the fridge</fex> but afterwards it never really recovered.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Speed
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Speed</fen> at which the <fen>Dough</fen> expands.
<ex>The bread dough <t>rose</t> <fex name="spe">quickly</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Manner
FE.definition:
<def-root>Any description of the rising of the <fen>Dough</fen> which is not covered by more specific FEs, including epistemic modification (<ment>probably</ment>, <ment>presumably</ment>, <ment>mysteriously</ment>) and general descriptions comparing events (<ment>the same way</ment>).
<ex>My dough <t>rose</t> <fex name="man">nicely</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Circumstances
FE.definition:
<def-root>A setting, often temporal or spatial, within which the event takes place. This FE also covers conditions that are causally connected to the event of the <fen>Dough</fen> rising.
<ex>The dough <t>rises</t> higher <fex name="cir">if made by the bread machine than made by a standard mixer</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Size_change
FE.definition:
<def-root>The amount by which the volume of the <fen>Dough</fen> increases.
<ex>While in the refrigerator, the dough <t>rose</t> <fex name="siz">by about 25%</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Explanation
FE.definition:
<def-root>The entity or state of affairs that leads to the event of the <fen>Dough</fen>'s rising.
<ex>A slimmer approach relies on the bubbles of carbon dioxide created as the dough <t>rises</t> <fex name="Explanation">from the yeast</fex>.</ex></def-root>

lexUnit.name: rise.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: to puff up as a result of leavening

lexUnit.name: prove.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: (of bread dough) become aerated by the action of yeast; rise
